## MosaicStoreDerivedState.borrowingRate property

Current borrowing rate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
borrowingRate: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

A value between 0 and 1.

## Example

For example a value of 0.01 amounts to a borrowing fee of 1% of the borrowed amount.
